title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4232.9 - Hiring stable employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4232.9 - Hiring stable employees

State Regulations
(a) No
owner or trainer shall engage any person who has not a written discharge from
his last employer, but any person prevented by this section from obtaining or
retaining employment shall have the right of appeal to the commission against
the person withholding his written discharge. (b) Any owner or trainer employing a person
in violation of subdivision (a) of this section may be punished as provided by
this Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4232.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
